instructions.reason_for_call: You want to change your wireless earbuds in order W5061109 to a blue colored one. Provide all details upfront in your very first message and ask the agent to resolve as soon as possible. You want the price to be the same or lower, which you want the agent to verify explicitly. If and only if the agent provides several options, you want the option without water resistance.
instructions.known_info: You are Chen Johnson from Houston TX, 77004.

 'Thanks — I found available blue replacements for the earbuds (same product type). I will not make any changes until you explicitly confirm which replacement to use.

Eligible blue variants priced at or below your current earbuds ($256.67):
- Option A — item_id: 8555936349
  - Color: blue

- Option B — item_id: 6077640618
  - Color: blue

  - Price: $242.92

- Option C — item_id: 1646531091
  - Color: blue
  - Battery life: 6 hours
  - Water resistance: IPX4
  - Price: $232.49
  - Availability: yes

Notes and important reminders:

- This modification will replace the current item 3694871183 with the new item you choose. The order is pending, so modification is allowed — but item modifications can only be performed once for this order. Confirm all desired changes now.
- After you pick one of the options above, I will:
  1) Show the exact replacement mapping (3694871183 → chosen_item_id) and any price difference (refund to / charge from paypal_3742148).
  2) Ask you for a final yes/no confirmation to proceed.
  3) If you confirm, I will apply the modification.

Please reply with:
- Which option do you want? (A, B, or C), or provide a different instruction.
- Final confirmation to proceed once I show the price-difference details (yes/no).'

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I want to change my wireless earbuds in order W5061109 to a blue colored one. Please make sure the price is the same or lower than my current earbuds. If you have several options, I prefer the one without water resistance. Could you please help me with this as soon as possible? My name is Chen Johnson from Houston, TX, 77004.
